title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: The file is marked as dirtied, even though no changes are made, and the code assist feature does not appear.
EB: If there are no suggestions provided by the code assist feature, the file should not be marked as dirtied.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the specific file in the editor.
2. Trigger the code assist feature by typing appropriate syntax or using a keyboard shortcut.
3. Note that the file is marked as dirtied even if no changes are made or suggested by the code assist.
